title: First Ride: Shimano’s New GRX Di2 Groupset is Wireless, But Still 2x Only
content:
Shimano's new 12 speed Di2 gravel groupset is more evolution than revolution, building on an already great foundation.

Read the full article at First Ride: Shimano’s New GRX Di2 Groupset is Wireless, But Still 2x Only on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
